thread.title: Philipp Lahm makes 500th Bayern Munich appearance — versatile German is one best full-backs of his generation, has won seven Bundesliga titles and is avid anti-homophobia campaigner
thread.title_full: Philipp Lahm makes 500th Bayern Munich appearance — versatile German is one best full-backs of his generation, has won seven Bundesliga titles and is avid anti-homophobia campaigner

author: arichardson
title: Philipp Lahm makes 500th Bayern Munich appearance — versatile German is one best full-backs of his generation, has won seven Bundesliga titles and is avid anti-homophobia campaigner
text:
EFL lahm the man Philipp Lahm makes 500th Bayern Munich appearance — versatile German is one best full-backs of his generation, has won seven Bundesliga titles and is avid anti-homophobia campaigner 
Hometown hero was born in Bavarian city, has always supported Bayern and was even ball boy at Olympiastadion By ANDREW RICHARDSON
